photos

Class Photos

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • photos.Photos

  • public class Photos
extends javafx.application.Application
    Main runner class responsible for switching between scenes and provides each scene with their necessary data.
    Author:
    Nicholas Petriello, Samuel Uganiza

    • Nested Class Summary

      • showDisplay

        public static javafx.stage.Stage showDisplay(int userIndex,
                                             int photoIndex,
                                             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Photo> photos)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates new display for display scene. Returns a reference to the stage for event handling.
        Parameters:
        userIndex - The index of the logged in user
        photoIndex - The index of the selected photo
        photos - The list of photos that is currently being shown
        Returns:
        The reference to the stage created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws IOException
